verbs.description: [ARG0: ansonia] [V: seeking] [ARG1: public input on riverwalk ansonia] - as the city prepares to add onto its riverwalk it is seeking input from residents a public information hearing on the next two phases of the riverwalk is slated for nov 8 at 6 p m in city hall 253 main street we are hoping to go out to bid in december with the construction work to begin in the spring said sheila o'malley the city economic development director and grants writer she believes construction could be completed by the fall these segments will take the riverwalk from pershing drive to south main street and the target shopping center site current plans include a multi - use trail with fencing along the naugatuck river flood control dikes on south main street south of target ansonia riverwalk park sheila omalley beacon falls naugatuck valley council of governments conn veterans’ memorial park naugatuck river greenway ansonia connecticut federal highway administration three saints orthodox church writer rick dunne mayor david cassetti derby greenway thomaston rapp paradise inn connecticut department of transportation naugatuck anaconda american brass naugatuck river copper city pathway bridge torrington seymour department of energy and environmental protection waterbury director sheila o’malley connecticut executive director city hall ansonia target rev patrick burns watertown north end shelton derby riverside drive ansonia copper

ansonia seeking public input on riverwalk ansonia - as the city prepares to add onto its riverwalk it is seeking input from residents a public information hearing on the next two phases of the riverwalk is slated for nov 8 at 6 p m in city hall 253 main street we are hoping to go out to bid in december with the construction work to begin in the spring said sheila o'malley the city economic development director and grants writer she believes construction could be completed by the fall these segments will take the riverwalk from pershing drive to south main street and the target shopping center site current plans include a multi - use trail with fencing along the naugatuck river flood control dikes on south main street south of target ansonia riverwalk park sheila omalley beacon falls naugatuck valley council of governments conn veterans’ memorial park [V: naugatuck] [ARG1: river greenway] ansonia connecticut federal highway administration three saints orthodox church writer rick dunne mayor david cassetti derby greenway thomaston rapp paradise inn connecticut department of transportation naugatuck anaconda american brass naugatuck river copper city pathway bridge torrington seymour department of energy and environmental protection waterbury director sheila o’malley connecticut executive director city hall ansonia target rev patrick burns watertown north end shelton derby riverside drive ansonia copper
